RainbruRPG::Network::Ident::xmlAttrbCatList

RainbruRPG::Network::Ident::xmlAttrbCatList Class Reference

#include <xmlattrbcatlist.h>

List of all members.

Detailed Description

Read the XML file of the attribute categories list.

The character's attributes are grouped into category. As the client GUI is dynamically created and we don't know how many attributes can be drawn, each attribute are categorized.

It uses TinyXML to deal with the XML file.

RainbruRPG::Network::Ident::tAttrbCatList * RainbruRPG::Network::Ident::xmlAttrbCatList::getAttrbCatList (  ) 

Returns the player list from the xml file.

This function is used by the PlayerList class to get the playerlist. This list is then iterates and we can feed the list of player names.

Returns:
A list of player

void RainbruRPG::Network::Ident::xmlAttrbCatList::loadDocument ( CurlFileToXml *  cgf  )  [private]

Loads the xml document or creates it if it does not exist.

It use the CurlFileToXml to get the document. If the document cannot be get this way, we log a warning message and set correctlyLoaded to false.

Parameters:
cgf A pointer to a valid CurlFileToXml instance.

Returns the text element from the child and the given node name.

This function is used for example to get the name of a player :

Parameters:
child The xml element where we must search the node.
nodeName The node's name we must find in child.
Returns:
The text store in the child's node defined by nodeName. Returns an empty string ("") if none child was found.
